entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
